primaryMeaning: Last Ten Days Of The Month
meaningMnemonic: These are the <kanji>below</kanji> <kanji>ten days</kanji> of the month. In other words, the <vocabulary>last ten days of the month</vocabulary>, or even just the <vocabulary>end of the month</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
